overview: Setlist:  01 Skynyrd Nation 02 Simple Life 03 That Smell 04 God and Guns 05 Still Unbroken 06 Gimme Three Steps 07 Call Me the Breeze 08 Sweet Home Alabama 09 Freebird  Band:  Gary Rossington - guitar Johnny Van Zant - vocals Rickey Medlocke - guitar Michael Cartellone - drums Robert Kearns – bass, backing vocals Peter Keys – keyboards Dale Krantz-Rossington – backing vocals Carol Chase – backing vocals
title: Lynyrd Skynyrd Live In Chicago
